channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for CT
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for CT

item.title: Report X-2023120628
item.description:
Report X-2023120628

Identified by scraper @ 2023-12-18T21:10:37+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-12-08
  • City: WILLINGTON
  • State: CT
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Pkg with no Hazmat markings was found with the top closures open. Pkg contains 4 x 19 oz. metal aerosol cans as well as several household appliance parts. One of the cans leaked wetting the contents. Upon discovery of the damage the pkg was forced into an unauthorized and unlined plastic bin that was taken to the HMPA for inspection and reporting. DescribePack: There is a small puncture hole in the side of 1 x 19 oz. metal aerosol cans, DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Pkg placed in bin.

  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Unprocessed Hazmat pkg was found to be wet and placed in a lined Hazmat bin and taken to the HMPA for inspection and reporting. DescribePack: Loose caps on 2 x 2.5 L plastic bottles. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Pkg placed in lined Hazmat bin.

item.title: Report X-2023120327
item.description:
Report X-2023120327

Identified by scraper @ 2023-12-18T21:10:37+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-12-02
  • City: WILLINGTON
  • State: CT
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: The metal drum was found on the floor next to an IC belt. The drum was on its side and leaking liquid. The top rim of the drum is dented. The closure is also dented and leaking. The drum was placed in a lined hazmat tote in the upright position. DescribePack: The closure of the drum is dented allowing liquid to leak out of it. The dent is about a half inch long. The duration of release was less then 5 minutes. DurationRel: 0 and MitigateEffect: The drum was put in a lined hazmat tote in the upright position.

item.title: Report X-2023120276
item.description:
Report X-2023120276

Identified by scraper @ 2023-12-19T18:11:18+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-11-30
  • City: WILLINGTON
  • State: CT
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Pkg with no Hazmat markings containing three inner boxes of Ltd Qty labelled items leaked wetting the end of the carton and a small portion of the top closures due to the contents being packed sideways perpendicular to the orientation arrows on the outer carton. Pkg was forced into a unlined unauthorized plastic bin and taken to the HMPA for inspection and reporting. DescribePack: loose trigger spray heads on several undeclared bottles. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Pkg forced into bin.

item.title: Report X-2023120274
item.description:
Report X-2023120274

Identified by scraper @ 2023-12-19T18:11:18+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-11-30
  • City: WILLINGTON
  • State: CT
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Pkg was offered at a FedEx Office and appears to have been packed in a carton provided by the location. Pkg contains a gasoline powered power washer with several ounces of gasoline still in the fuel tank of the machine. Pkg was found wet on one side due to the pkg with no orientation arrows required for pkgs containing liquid being loaded on its side. Pkg was removed from the trailer unloading area, placed on a flat cart and taken to the HMPA. Pkg was staged in front of an ajar bay door to reduce the smell of fumes. DescribePack: Loose cap on fuel tank of gasoline powered engine. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Pkg was placed in an upright position and cap was secured to mitigate further release.

item.title: Report X-2023120178
item.description:
Report X-2023120178

Identified by scraper @ 2023-12-19T18:11:18+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-11-30
  • City: WILLINGTON
  • State: CT
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Pkg was dropped during the trailer loading process causing damage to the contents. Management waited several minutes before requesting authorized personnel to respond to the spill location. The spill and damaged contents were properly cleaned up and placed in lined Hazmat bins then transported to the HMPA for reporting. DescribePack: 2 x 4 L glass bottles shattered. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Oil Dri absorbent was used to clean the spilled liquid. Undamaged contents were placed in a lined Hazmat bin, damaged contents were placed in a second lined Hazmat bin and cleanup material with debris was placed in a third lined Hazmat bin.

item.title: Report X-2023120106
item.description:
Report X-2023120106

Identified by scraper @ 2023-12-15T21:09:53+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-11-25
  • City: SOUTH WINDSOR
  • State: CT
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Wet, damaged package was unloaded from trailer and immediately removed from workflow. Package was left in Unload area for QA member discovery. Package was placed in a plastic tote. DescribePack: Five of the forty-seven aerosol cans have cracked and/or missing caps, permitting discharge of flammable contents. DurationRel: 0 and MitigateEffect: Package was placed in a plastic tote to prevent further release or seepage of flammable aerosol.
